context.text: Serie C2 2008-09 - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
[ edit ] Confirmed teams from Serie C2 2007 08
The 2008 09 Serie C2 season will be the thirty-first since its establishment in 1978 . 54 teams will contest the league, divided in three conferences called gironi .
It is likely to contain information of a speculative nature and the content may change as the event approaches and more information becomes available.
This article or section contains information about a future sporting event or team .
